desc: 光を反射せずすべて吸い込むような黒さを持った石

dictionary.lore: A stone of the darkest black in the world. It absorbs all light. The light absorbed can be transformed into magic and extracted from the Abyss Stone, though only in minute amounts. Its unique properties allow for virtually unlimited production of magic, which is why it is used in equipment that expends a great deal of magic.

name: 闇珠石
